titleStmt.title: Festum voluptatis, or The banquet of pleasure furnished with much variety of speculations, wittie, pleasant, and delightfull. Containing divers choyce love-posies, songs, sonnets, odes, madrigals, satyrs, epigrams, epitaphs and elegies. For varietie and pleasure the like never before published. By S.P. Gent.
titleStmt.author: Pick, Samuel.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E[lizabeth] P[urslowe] for Bernard Langford, and are to be sold at the signe of the Blue Bible at Holborne-Bridge,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: the signe of the Blue Bible at Holborne-Bridge
